item.title: Basical softwares
item.description: Softwares on Windows Matlab & Mathematica TexLive & WinEdt 10.2 Adobe Illustrator OriginLab Pro Adobe Acrobat Xmanger ( include Xshell and Xftp ) Geek Unistall Bandzip Personal favoriate softwares Listary ( Lanch apps elegantly ) Everthing ( Search files fastly ) WGestures ( Modern mouse gestures for Windows ) Snipaste ( Capture screen as a picture and paste it on screen ) Sublime ( Code editor ) Zotero ( Reference managment ) Squirrel/小狼毫/中州韵 ( Input source ) or Google Input Inkscape ( draw figure ) RStudio ( R editor) Google Earth
